# Unicode.ASCII.ReverseParser

**Type Alias**

A type that can be used to parse a reversed sequence of `CodeUnits` into `EncodedScalar`s.

## Declaration

```swift
typealias ReverseParser = Unicode.ASCII.Parser
```
title: Unicode.ASCII.ReverseParser
